title: Chemical weapons in Syria: A history of obstruction
text:
Chemical weapons in Syria: A history of obstruction 12:42pm EDT - 01:59 
Chemical weapons inspectors hoping to reach the suspected gas attack site in Syria that sparked the West's retaliatory strikes were delayed on Monday. Similar efforts over the years faced systematic obstruction. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Chemical weapons inspectors hoping to reach the suspected gas attack site in Syria that sparked the West's retaliatory strikes were delayed on Monday.
